answers.answer: "Oh and has anyone seen stars while they were preggo?"I have!!!  I've been seeing them for weeks.  I asked my OB and he says I need to go to an eye doc, because as far as he can tell (blood pressure and whatnot) that it's unrelated to the pg.  ???

I saw lots of stars in my first pregnancy.. my blood pressure was fine.. and my doctor has no clue as to why.. he called them floaters.. but.. i think it was something else.. not serious of course..I am due in March.... and am  totally ready.. between waking up with acid stuck in my throat to the constant pain in my upper right side.. to having letdown already .. and feeling like a bowling ball is inside me..im ready...lol hope everyone is feeling well !!

I am not due until May but I have been seeing stars too, along with being dizzy and kind of shaky.  I had it some during my first pregnancy and Dr. said my blood sugar must be droping, but I have a appt. Thursday and I am going to ask my new dr. about it.  When it happens I have usually ate and I am not hungry so I don't feel like it is my sugar.

I totally know what you mean!  I am so ready!  I have 7 weeks left.  How long do you have??  I have lots of people saying Oh I dont think you will make it that long.  I feel like such a whale some days!  And the back, leg, hip pain and heartburn and nausea are driving me nuts too!  I hate eating cause I feel sick afterwards (I thought you were suppoed to feel like that in the 1st trimester not the last...LOL)!!  I just want this little guy to wait until I get some clothes washed for him before he comes.  I hope at 38 weeks he comes.  I keep thinking he will.  i have a c-section scheduled (well not formally yet) for March 6th.  I think when we schedule that it will make it more real to me that he is almost here cause it seems like an ETERNITY away!  I go to the dr on thursday so I am going to ask about the stars thing.  How are you feeling otherwise?I tell you ladies, if I was to go based on symptoms alone I would swear I was having a girl this time cause its so different from when I was preggo the 1st time.

Can someone explain what it feels like to have "pressure" in your lower abdomen?  I think I was having it yesterday afternoon/last nite but I cant be sure cause I dont really know what it would feel like.

sounds to me like you do have gestational diabetes, but it sounds like your sugar is probably high. And do u get thirsty alot also?? That is all symptoms of g/d.Stephd- oh i am sooooooooooo readyyyyyyyy. lol i go to my appt today at 4pm. We don't have much longer!!! But u know what i'll miss, the lil kicks! It'll feel weird without them.I think i'm actually going to get scheduled for a c-section in the middle of feburary maybe. I hope so atleast!And your 'spots' could be coming from low blood. I had low blood 'anemia' and saw spots quite often, sometimes felt like i was going to passout and had to sit down. So that could be it. Or sugar??? Ask dr!

I'm due end of Feb beginning of March, lot's of abdominal discomfort and heaviness... Yes very light headed today as well, I can't wait to have this little guy in my arms, not to metion I have been pregnant for over a year now, lol...Well if you don't count the 6 weeks between my loss at 20 weeks and getting pregnant 6 weeks later, my body has had it :-)  Sticky sticky baby dust to all, and God blessHi Steph how are you???
I will ask about it at the Dr. this week.  I have been drinking more latley.  Thanks for the help.
I'm due March 16 but hoping for an earlier time because he's already so big!!! I can't wait to be able to hold him and see what he looks like. Hopefully just like his daddy!!!!

sherry:  I know what you mean....I will miss the lil' kicks too!  I love that feeling so much!  Noone can understand what it feels like unless you have been preggo.  Its such an od feeling!thendricks: I am ok I guess.  Just ready for all this to be over.  I think I am getting a little um, cranky (to put it nicely) since I am so ready!  But he has to stay in there atleast 5 more weeks.  I cant wait now.  I just want to have him in my arms!  How are you??

Do ya'll know when the baby starts to move less?  Like how many weeks?  This little man scares me sometimes because he doesnt move as much one day as he does the next.  I hate to keep calling the dr or going to L&D.  I feel like I am being a paranoid mommy!  HELP!!

I'm good :-) I know what you mean about being cranky! My poor 7 year old daughter, I try to explain my mood swings and she pretends she gets it, but I know she doesn't..She is so excited.. I'm ready to have him too, I have gained way to much weight, being pregnant for a year straight has reeked havoc on my poor body, I wouldn't have it any other way though, it is so worth it :-) I have gotten a few stretch marks on just one side on my hips, not bad but it's odd to just get them on 1 side and not the other, did you ever make it on to i-am-pregnant.com?

I'm due February 23rd, but I think I'll die if I actually make it that far :) my baby is measuring three weeks ahead so I hope that means I'll have her early.  Plus people are constantly asking me if I'm due any day now, which is getting pretty old since I've been hearing it since I was 31 weeks!  I'm just uncomfortable overall, especially when I try to sleep, or walk, or move, lol.

my baby is due march 1-i feel great even though i am soo tired-i did get sick the last two days-and i thought the same thing-i thought morning sickness was in the 1st trimester-although i really didnt get too much of that-we dont know what we are having so its a surprise-we wer told a bpy but we cant go by the percentage-we still have to pick a girl name out-anywho soon our lil ones will be in our arms-this is my first so of course i am VERY nervous about labor

Due March 1st - hoping for mid February. I'll miss the kicks, but I'd prefer to see the feet kicking than feel them, if you know what I mean. Last night I accidentally pointed my toe and gave myself the worst leg cramp.I've occasionally seen stars- once when we landed in the US and I was in line at immigration. I think it was the extra oxygen, since I live a mile and a half up usually. But other than that, not really. I'm definitely getting anxious. Not worried about labor, just don't want to wait until March.
Dreamt last night that I did not survive childbirth, mind you that it is my 3rd but getting less and less sleep each night is making me cranky too.

due march 15. baby's definitely moving less than she was, tho she moves for a few days - then seems to barely move for a few days. i think its positional, they seem to work themselves into some weird position where their kicks are all inward or something.

I've been noticing a big change in my baby's movements, so I looked in all my pregnancy books and they say around 34 weeks is when baby becomes less active because there's barely any room.  I imagine you can notice this change anywhere from 32 weeks on, that's around the time I noticed it.

due at the end of March, but feeling it alot lately!  Very uncomfortable today, like my stomach needs to stretch alot more, very tight.  She is squirming today alot, makes up for a very quiet day yesterday.  Yes, I saw stars yesterday, not all the time but often enough.  BP has been good thus far, next appointment is Friday.  Cannot tell what position she is in anymore, she was breech a few weeks ago and I still think she is.  Does anyone know how to tell?

I am due around the middle of March.. but I dont think I will go that long... I am being seen every two weeks now.. which really makes the time go by fast....you know.. I just found out that they now give you antibiotics if you deliver BEFORE 35 weeks... i had never had that happen before.... I PRAY i go to at least 36 weeks..lol... I am showing 30 weeks now.. so.. I hope that I go to like 37-38 weeks..thats around the middle of march.. this being my seventh.. I am not sure what to expect.. it seemed for a while that the baby wanted to come early.. thank goodness he didnt.. but now.. hes very quiet.... ALso.. my last appointment I had not gained any weight.. I have lost about a pound.. the doc wasnt concerned.. but it kind of worries me.. i feel alot of pelvic pressure now.. and even my BM's are not what they used to be.. I AM SOOO excited now though.. seems like every morning i wake up .. i say to myself.. OMG! I am going to have another baby..lol.. Keep in tough and let me know how you are doing.... !!!! wash those baby clothes..lol.. ( ok i admit i still have to do that..lol)

First, I was told I was due Feb. 25th, but when I went in to my new Dr., they told me that one of the Dr.s at my OLD office had changed my due date to March 5th and never told me. I do believe that my new Dr.s office is going to try and re-date the preg. to see where I'm REALLY at... Of course, if they find out that I do have preeclampsia on top of everything else, baby may have to come out (c-section) alot sooner... it feels like his head is in my chest (maybe cause it is...) UGGH!!!

question: I was just wondering who all was due in March or the end of Feb.  Thought we could chat about our symptoms and stuff.Good luck and baby dust to all!!!Oh and has anyone seen stars while they were preggo?  Do you know what this could be?  I see them off and on....the other day was really bad!
title: Who is due in March??
